title: Migrate GoReflaxeCompiler from manual module sweep to GenericCompiler callbacks
description: Current Reflaxe integration registers a BaseCompiler adapter and reuses legacy module-wide lowering in onCompileEnd. Move to GenericCompiler and compile class/enum entries through Reflaxe callbacks so we can leverage type usage tracking, module output partitioning, and hooks incrementally.
close_reason: Migrated GoReflaxeCompiler to callback-driven module selection via compileClass/compileEnum and validated full snapshot/CI gates.

title: Add gopher/metal literal string-op folding pass
description: Implement profile-aware RewriteStringOpsPass that folds compile-time literal StringConcatAny/StringEqualAny patterns for gopher/metal while keeping portable unchanged; add snapshot coverage.

title: Implement functional sys.Http shim semantics
description: Current sys.Http coverage is minimal (type + constructor) to unblock full stdlib go-test probes. Implement practical request semantics (header/param/post handling, callbacks, responseData/responseBytes updates, basic error/status propagation) with tests and document profile/runtime tradeoffs.
close_reason: Implemented functional sys.Http shim semantics (headers/params/post handling, callback flow, response caching, requestUrl), added deterministic runtime snapshot coverage, and documented current tradeoffs.

title: Devirtualize leaf constructor-local call sites in gopher/metal
description: Extend RewriteVirtualCallsPass to rewrite localVar.__hx_this.method to localVar.method when localVar is initialized from New_<LeafType>() and not reassigned, for non-portable profiles only. Add paired gopher/portable snapshots.

title: Expand upstream stdlib parity from documented 32-module gap list
description: Triage and implement missing lowering/runtime shims for modules listed in docs/feature-support-matrix.md parity-gap probe, expanding strict CI sweep set incrementally with deterministic tests.
close_reason: Expanded strict upstream stdlib sweep from 23 to 53 CI-gated modules, added shim coverage for previously missing module symbols, and reduced broad probe inventory from 32 failures to only 2 upstream-missing modules (tracked separately).

title: Define snapshot policy for optimized vs pre-optimization AST under Reflaxe lifecycle
description: ReflectCompiler compiles at onAfterGenerate, which can normalize expressions/temporaries compared with prior onAfterTyping snapshots. Decide and document canonical policy (accept optimized output, or preserve pre-opt shape via explicit mode) and codify in tests/docs.
close_reason: Documented canonical post-Reflaxe snapshot shape policy and added optimized_ast_policy sentinel snapshot; full snapshot/CI gates green.

title: Add Haxe interface lowering and coverage
description: Emit Go interfaces for Haxe interfaces, lower interface types and interface-typed locals correctly, and add interface dispatch regression snapshot.
close_reason: Added interface declaration lowering, interface type lowering/locals handling, and core/interface_dispatch_basic regression snapshot with full CI green

title: Add root dev:hx workflow for compile + go action orchestration
description: Provide scripts/dev/go-hx.sh similar to haxe.rust cargo-hx wrapper: pick compile*.hxml by project/profile/ci, run Haxe compile, resolve go output dir, then run go action (run|build|test|vet|fmt). Wire npm script(s) and document task/package-manager stance (npm for orchestration, go modules for package/build).
close_reason: Added root dev:hx wrapper for compile+hxml resolution+Go actions, wired npm script, and documented tooling model for go modules + npm orchestration

title: EX-0 Epic: Multi-profile examples program
description: Deliver examples scaffolding, profile_storyboard + tui_todo multi-profile examples, generated-go sync, binary matrix, CI integration, and docs.

title: EX-1 Examples scaffold + policy
description: Add examples/ framework, AGENTS policy, examples index, npm script wiring, and test harness entrypoint skeleton.

title: EX-2 profile_storyboard example
description: Implement compact profile-idiom example with portable/gopher/metal runtime adapters, multi-profile compile hxmls, and deterministic tests.

title: EX-3 tui_todo shared core + portable baseline
description: Implement canonical complex TUI todo app core with deterministic harness and portable profile build.

title: EX-4 tui_todo gopher/metal adapters + additive features
description: Add gopher and metal tailored adapters with additive capabilities while preserving baseline semantics.

title: EX-5 generated-go sync/bless pipeline
description: Add scripts to sync generated go outputs into committed generated/profile trees and validation.

title: EX-6 binary matrix build + artifact manifest
description: Add cross-platform example binary build script and checksum/manifest emission.

title: EX-7 CI integration for examples
description: Integrate examples stage in CI runner with skip/force flags and defaults.

title: EX-8 docs + profile justification in examples
description: Document examples matrix, commands, profile tailored code, and rationale.

title: Add snapshot coverage for nested @hxml go_output detection
description: Create a snapshot case where go_output is provided only through nested @hxml includes to ensure BuildDetection enables compiler bootstrap/init correctly.
close_reason: Added core/nested_hxml_define_detection snapshot and fixed BuildDetection nested include parsing for both @include and .hxml include tokens with fallback candidate resolution.

title: Add snapshot bless mode
description: Implement --bless mode in test/run-snapshots.py to update only changed intended files and print a concise change-cause checklist for each blessed file; add docs and npm script.

title: Add haxe.ds.Vector runtime parity fixtures and promote support tier
description: Add deterministic snapshot and semantic-diff fixtures for haxe.ds.Vector operations so support is no longer compile-only. Update docs/feature-support-matrix.md evidence and ensure CI remains green.
acceptance_criteria: New snapshot fixture covers core Vector behaviors (construction, set/get, length, bounds-safe usage); semantic-diff fixture compares runtime output vs --interp; feature matrix evidence is updated from compile-only to runtime-covered tier; npm run test:ci passes.
notes: Starting Vector fixture implementation: add snapshot + semantic-diff coverage and update support matrix tier evidence.
close_reason: Added stdlib/vector_basic snapshot + vector_contract semantic fixture, implemented Vector array-lowering fixes in compiler, promoted haxe.ds.Vector to semantic-diff coverage in docs, and validated with npm run test:ci.

title: Use GenericCompiler callback type queues in GoReflaxeCompiler
description: Collect ClassType/EnumType directly in compileClassImpl/compileEnumImpl and compile from selected typed collections, with safe fallback to module-based path when callbacks are empty.
close_reason: GoReflaxeCompiler now queues class/enum types directly from GenericCompiler callbacks and compiles via GoCompiler.compileSelectedTypes with module fallback; full snapshot and CI gates pass.

title: Fix post-public CI workflow execution failures
Fix Array constructor lowering for generated Go
description: new Array constructor calls currently lower to an undefined New_Array symbol in generated Go. This surfaced during Vector runtime coverage work and was temporarily worked around in fixtures. Add direct lowering/runtime support so normal Array construction always compiles.
acceptance_criteria: new Array constructor compiles and runs without undefined symbols; snapshot coverage exists for constructor behavior; npm run test:ci passes.
notes: Starting Array constructor lowering fix: replace undefined New_Array emission with concrete []T construction semantics and add snapshot coverage.
close_reason: Lowered new Array() directly to []T{} (no New_Array symbol), added core/array_constructor_new snapshot regression, updated support matrix evidence, and validated with full CI.

title: Tighten Std.isOfType dynamic checks and Dynamic local typing
description: Fix Dynamic local declaration to preserve any typing and extend Std.isOfType dynamic checks for class/array targets with regression coverage.
close_reason: Dynamic locals now preserve any typing (no := narrowing), Std.isOfType dynamic class/array checks tightened, and std_is_of_type_dynamic regression snapshot added

title: Add new-project scaffold generator for reflaxe.go
description: Provide a templates/basic skeleton and scripts/dev/new-project.sh to scaffold a Haxe->Go app with setup, compile, run, build, and test tasks; wire npm dev:new-project and docs.
close_reason: Added templates/basic scaffold with new-project generator, setup/hx-go task scripts, npm wiring, and docs; validated scaffold generation and script helps

title: Support break/continue statements
description: Add lowering for TBreak and TContinue plus Go AST/printer support, and snapshot coverage for loop control flow semantics.

title: Adopt GPL-3.0-only project licensing
Add enum switch payload binding regression coverage
description: Add core snapshot for switch cases that bind enum constructor payload values.
close_reason: Added core/enum_switch_bindings payload binding regression snapshot; full CI green

title: Reduce unsupportedExpr hard-fail surface with explicit typed-node coverage
description: Audit lowerExpr/lowerLValue hard-fail guards, replace reachable catch-all paths with explicit lowering or typed diagnostics, and add regression snapshots for each supported/unsupported branch.
close_reason: Added explicit lowering coverage for expression-form if/switch/try in value positions and added runtime-regression snapshots for call-arg and value contexts.

title: Support postfix inc/dec in expression contexts
description: Lower postfix OpIncrement/OpDecrement in expression position (for example call arguments) instead of fatal error, and add snapshot coverage for returned-value semantics.

title: Prune redundant blank identifier assignments in non-portable output
description: In RewriteVirtualCallsPass for non-portable profiles, remove statements of the form '_ = x' when the immediate next statement uses x and does not declare/shadow x. This reduces output noise while preserving compile safety.

title: Expand sys.Http advanced parity (proxy/multipart/customRequest)
description: Current sys.Http shim now covers synchronous request basics, but advanced upstream behaviors remain partial: proxy support, multipart fileTransfer/customRequest variants, and deeper parity with HttpBase/sys.Http status/error semantics. Add targeted snapshots and wire behavior incrementally without regressing the strict full stdlib sweep.
close_reason: Implemented advanced sys.Http parity and coverage

title: Migrate GoReflaxeCompiler to GenericCompiler base
description: Replace BaseCompiler adapter with GenericCompiler-based implementation so class/enum selection is driven by compileClassImpl/compileEnumImpl callbacks and backend structure matches reusable Reflaxe target patterns.
close_reason: GoReflaxeCompiler now extends GenericCompiler and uses compileClassImpl/compileEnumImpl callbacks for module selection; snapshot and CI gates pass.

title: Close haxe.Http go-test parity gap in full stdlib sweep
description: Full runtime-eligible stdlib sweep currently needs an expected-unavailable policy exception for haxe.Http at go_test stage (undefined: sys__Http). Implement the underlying lowering/runtime fix so haxe.Http passes generated Go go test in strict full sweep, then remove the policy exception and update docs.

title: Add gopher non-leaf dispatch preservation regression snapshot
description: Add a gopher profile snapshot proving non-leaf virtual dispatch is preserved (no unsafe devirtualization), using Base/Child override semantics and runtime assertion.

title: Support RestIterator lowering for varargs foreach
description: Varargs currently work for array-style access and while loops, but 'for (v in values)' over haxe.Rest lowers to TNew(haxe.iterators.RestIterator, ...) which is not yet lowered. Add TNew + iterator pathway so varargs foreach is supported without workaround.

title: Phase P0: Stdlib behavioral parity tier-2 + perf hardening
description: Track post-v0.4 production-grade parity work: add deterministic runtime/semantic parity fixtures for high-risk stdlib modules and tighten perf guardrails for metal profile.
close_reason: All child parity/perf/migration beads completed and validated in CI.

title: Add deterministic semantic fixtures for Serializer/Unserializer and EReg
description: Expand semantic diff coverage with deterministic cases for haxe.Serializer/haxe.Unserializer roundtrips and EReg matching/replacement/split edge semantics.
close_reason: Added deterministic semantic-diff fixtures for Serializer/Unserializer and EReg, implemented runtime shim coverage in GoCompiler, updated docs, and validated with full test:ci green.

title: Migrate haxe.Json shim from compiler core to std/_std
description: Replace compiler-emitted json shim decls with std/_std-backed implementation (or extern+runtime package) while preserving snapshot parity and strict-sweep behavior.
acceptance_criteria: No json declarations emitted from lowerJsonStdlibShimDecls; snapshot parity retained for stdlib/json_parse_stringify; strict stdlib sweep remains green.
notes: Completed JSON shim extraction: removed compiler-emitted JSON decls/group, lowered Json/JsonPrinter/JsonParser paths directly to hxrt runtime, updated stdlib/json_parse_stringify snapshot, and validated with strict stdlib sweeps (55/55 + 175/175) and full CI.
close_reason: JSON shim migrated out of compiler declaration core with runtime-lowered parity and strict sweep green

title: Migrate Sys/File/Process shim path out of compiler core
description: Move sys shim behavior currently generated by lowerSysStdlibShimDecls into std/_std or runtime extern wrappers, keeping existing sys/file/process smoke contract behavior.
acceptance_criteria: lowerSysStdlibShimDecls no longer emits behavior-heavy decls; sys/file/process snapshot coverage remains green; docs updated with ownership boundary.
notes: Starting Sys/File/Process shim extraction from compiler core; goal is runtime-lowered or std/_std path with parity fixtures intact.
close_reason: Sys/File/Process behavior moved to runtime (hxrt); compiler path is forwarding-only; snapshot+stdlib sweep+full CI green; ownership boundary documented.

title: Reduce stdlib_symbols conversion overhead without breaking parity
description: Address measured Base64 shim overhead from []int<->[]byte conversion path (hxrt_haxeBytesToRaw/hxrt_rawToHaxeBytes) through targeted runtime/shim optimization while preserving haxe.io.Bytes semantics.
acceptance_criteria: perf-stdlib-shim-review reports lower ns/op or allocs for generated shim path compared to current baseline on same machine; semantic diff crypto/xml/zip fixtures remain green.
notes: Implemented stdlib_symbols bytes-conversion optimization by adding internal raw-byte cache fields to generated haxe__io__Bytes and wiring cache reuse in hxrt_haxeBytesToRaw/hxrt_rawToHaxeBytes (with mutation invalidation in set). Validated via perf harness comparative sample against pre-change commit (median shim ns/op 135.0 -> 74.75), semantic diff crypto_xml_zip, and full npm run test:ci.
close_reason: stdlib_symbols conversion-path optimization landed with parity coverage and measured perf improvement

title: Add deterministic runtime parity fixture for sys.net.Socket loopback
description: Add local loopback socket fixture validating accept/connect/read/write/close semantics without external network dependency.
close_reason: Added deterministic semantic diff fixture for sys.net.Socket loopback (bind/listen/connect/accept/read/write/close), implemented dedicated net_socket shim group in GoCompiler, updated docs, and validated with full test:ci green.

title: Harden metal perf guardrails with enforceable CI budgets
description: Promote metal profile performance checks from soft warning to enforceable thresholds while preserving noise controls for portable/gopher.

title: Publish coverage-tier matrix in README + feature docs
description: Document compile-only vs behavior snapshot vs semantic-diff guarantee tiers and map representative modules/cases.
notes: Published explicit coverage-tier model (compile-only vs snapshot vs semantic-diff) in README and docs/feature-support-matrix, including representative module/case mapping and guarantee language for partial vs fully supported surfaces.
close_reason: Coverage-tier matrix and representative mappings published in README + feature docs

title: Harden Serializer/EReg shims to full Haxe contract parity
description: Current Serializer/Unserializer + EReg support is deterministic and CI-covered for high-signal scenarios, but not yet full Haxe contract parity (format compatibility, advanced flags/options, edge regex behavior). Expand parity with dedicated snapshots/semantic-diff coverage and contract docs.
close_reason: Closed: EReg option/error/global parity landed with new semantic fixtures; serializer wire-format baseline and remaining deep token compatibility now tracked in haxe.go-7zy.8

title: Extend sys.net.Socket shim to advanced semantics (timeouts/select/blocking)
description: Current net_socket shim covers deterministic loopback parity for bind/listen/connect/accept/read/write/close. Add contract tests + implementations for setTimeout, waitForRead, setBlocking, setFastSend, select, and shutdown parity semantics.
notes: Implemented advanced net socket shim semantics: setTimeout deadline wiring, waitForRead readiness path, setBlocking deadline mode, setFastSend via TCP_NODELAY, shutdown read/write closure handling, and readiness-filtered Socket.select. Added semantic fixture test/semantic_diff/socket_advanced_contract and updated socket contract docs.
close_reason: Advanced sys.net.Socket shim semantics + semantic contract coverage landed

title: Review stdlib shim necessity vs built-in Haxe mechanisms
description: Run a focused architecture/perf review comparing compiler-core shims against simpler alternatives (extern-backed runtime package, stricter std/_std transpilation, and narrowly scoped __go__ for internal runtime only). Keep shims where they materially improve correctness/perf, and remove/avoid them when a simpler mechanism is feasible.
acceptance_criteria: Publish a documented decision matrix with measured tradeoffs; include at least one perf/code-shape comparison for shim vs simpler path on representative surfaces; open follow-up implementation beads for any surfaces selected for migration away from shims.
notes: Published decision matrix + measured shim-vs-direct benchmark in docs/stdlib-shim-rationale.md, added reproducible harness scripts/ci/perf-stdlib-shim-review.sh (npm run test:perf:stdlib-shims), and opened follow-up migration/optimization tasks haxe.go-7zy.10/.11/.12.
close_reason: Shim necessity review completed with measured tradeoffs and follow-up migration beads

title: Implement Haxe Serializer/Unserializer wire-format compatibility
description: Replace the current JSON-backed serializer shim path with Haxe wire-format compatible encode/decode behavior (token stream compatibility, sequential unserialize cursor behavior, cache/reference semantics, and enum/object edge cases) while preserving deterministic generated Go output.
acceptance_criteria: Semantic diff includes explicit wire-format/token fixtures and sequential unserialize fixtures; haxe.Serializer/haxe.Unserializer roundtrip and replay semantics match Haxe --interp for covered cases; documentation updates clearly list supported tokens and any scoped exclusions.
notes: Added cache/reference parity milestone: serializer now tracks enum instances for useCache=true (r-token parity), plus new semantic fixture test/semantic_diff/serializer_cache_reference_contract covering repeated enum/class/custom references, class cycle replay, and unserialize replay paths. Updated docs to include cache/reference fixture and narrowed remaining exclusions.
close_reason: Serializer wire-format/cache-reference parity fixtures and docs landed

title: Broaden serializer resolver polymorphism and exotic edge fixtures
description: Expand haxe.Serializer/haxe.Unserializer parity beyond current fixture set by validating resolver method-shape polymorphism and rarer token/graph combinations across targets. Focus: resolver method signature variants and fallback behavior, mixed cache/string-reference stress streams, and scoped documentation of any intentional exclusions.
notes: Implemented resolver invocation polymorphism in unserializer (method receiver + dynamic/object resolver forms via interface signatures and reflective function-field fallback), added semantic fixtures serializer_resolver_polymorphism_contract and serializer_reference_stress_contract, and updated serializer support docs.
close_reason: Resolver polymorphism and mixed reference stress fixtures landed

title: Add super-call semantics regression coverage
description: Add core snapshot for super.method direct dispatch and inherited base virtual dispatch semantics, then patch compiler if needed.
close_reason: Added core/super_calls snapshot covering super direct dispatch and super base-method virtual dispatch; full CI green

title: Support compound assignment operators
description: Implement OpAssignOp lowering for statement and expression contexts (for example i += 2 and value = i += 2) with snapshot coverage.

title: Enable real parallel snapshot jobs
description: Implement actual parallel case execution for --jobs in test/run-snapshots.py while preserving deterministic case ordering and output summary.

title: Phase0 foundation: stdlib sweep hardening + perf harness + release checks
close_reason: Completed phase0 foundation deliverables: hardened stdlib sweep, perf harness + CI wiring, and release visibility checks/docs.

title: Define target-eligible stdlib policy for Go
close_reason: Defined target-eligible stdlib policy inputs and aligned sweep policy files.

title: Make stdlib sweep concurrency-safe (lock + isolated workdir)
close_reason: Added sweep run locking, isolated per-run workdirs, and lock timeout controls.

title: Improve stdlib probe model to avoid generic/module false negatives
close_reason: Switched to include-first probing with typed fallback for invalid-commandline-class false negatives.

title: Publish full stdlib inventory + expected-unavailable policy
close_reason: Published full runtime-eligible stdlib inventory and version-aware expected-unavailable policy.

title: Add Go profile vs pure-Go performance harness
close_reason: Added Go profile performance harness with baseline/update mode and soft-budget warnings.

title: Wire perf harness soft warnings + artifacts into CI
close_reason: Wired perf harness into ci-harness with artifact upload and release gating dependencies.

title: Add release visibility checks and docs
close_reason: Added release visibility status checks script and docs for release path normalization assumptions.

title: Harden BuildDetection hxml token parsing for tab/whitespace separators
description: Replace simple space-split tokenization in BuildDetection with whitespace-aware scanner and add regression snapshot where go_output define is provided with tab-separated -D syntax in nested hxml include.
close_reason: Replaced hxml space-split parsing with whitespace/quote-aware tokenization in BuildDetection and added nested quoted-define regression snapshot coverage; full snapshot and CI gates pass.

title: Harden workflows for no-postinstall npm CI installs
Expand semantic diff fixture coverage beyond core semantics
description: Add additional semantic differential fixtures for stdlib-heavy and edge-case behaviors (numeric edge cases, reflection, nullable structs, and selected sys/io behavior) after current core suite.
close_reason: Expanded semantic differential suite beyond core with numeric edge cases, nullable reference-typed class field behavior, selected sys/io roundtrip behavior, and reflection compare semantics; integrated full CI coverage and filed follow-up for deeper Reflect field APIs.

title: Add process lock to snapshot harness to prevent concurrent out-dir races
description: run-snapshots.py should enforce a cross-process lock so concurrent harness invocations cannot clobber shared out/ folders; include timeout option and harden cleanup against transient missing paths.
close_reason: Added process-level run lock to run-snapshots.py with configurable timeout and cleanup hardening to prevent concurrent out-dir races; documented behavior in test README.

title: Add pre-commit security/quality hooks (gitleaks + formatter)
description: Add hook installer, pre-commit hook with staged gitleaks scan and staged Haxe formatting, local path guard, docs, and CI gitleaks workflow.

title: Add haxe.Int32 runtime parity fixture and tier promotion
description: Promote haxe.Int32 from compile-only representative status by adding deterministic semantic-diff coverage for overflow, bitwise, shift, ucompare, and mixed Int/Float operator behavior; update support docs and keep CI green.
acceptance_criteria: New test/semantic_diff/int32_contract fixture matches --interp vs reflaxe.go portable output; docs/feature-support-matrix.md and test/semantic_diff/README.md include Int32 coverage; npm run test:ci passes.
close_reason: Added semantic_diff/int32_contract parity fixture; fixed OpAssign expression lowering path, float/int numeric promotion for float-result arithmetic, and int32 constant-wrap codegen via hxrt.Int32Wrap; updated support matrix + semantic diff docs; refreshed snapshots/examples; full npm run test:ci pass.

title: Add semantic differential regression harness against a reference Haxe target
description: Run selected semantic fixtures on reflaxe.go and a reference target, compare stdout/behavior, and gate regressions for nullability, exceptions, enum/switch, and dispatch semantics.
close_reason: Added semantic differential harness (interp vs reflaxe.go portable), seeded fixtures for nullability/exceptions/enum-switch/dispatch, and integrated stage into run-ci with docs and npm command.

title: Add behavioral parity fixtures for newly strict-gated stdlib modules
description: The strict upstream sweep now gates 53 modules, but many new entries are symbol/type-availability probes only. Add focused snapshot + semantic diff fixtures for high-value modules (e.g. StringTools, Date/Math, Type/Reflect, xml parser/printer, zip, crypto helpers) to convert symbol-level parity into behavior-validated parity.
close_reason: Added stdlib behavioral shim support (StringTools/Math/Date/Path/Option) and locked it with new snapshot fixtures plus semantic differential cases integrated into CI; filed follow-up for crypto/xml/zip behavior coverage.

title: Add static security analysis workflow (CodeQL + dependency audit)
description: Add CI workflow for CodeQL and dependency vulnerability checks to complement gitleaks and strengthen 1.0 security posture.
close_reason: Added Security static-analysis CI workflow with CodeQL (go/python/js-ts), PR dependency review, and dependency vulnerability audit (npm audit + govulncheck); added local security:deps command and security docs updates.

title: Fix unsigned right shift semantics
description: Lower OpUShr using unsigned 32-bit shift semantics instead of signed >>, and add snapshot coverage for negative values.

title: Add haxe.PosInfos runtime parity fixtures and tier promotion
description: Promote haxe.PosInfos from compile-only representative status by adding deterministic snapshot and semantic-diff fixtures validating default PosInfos injection behavior in generated Go.
acceptance_criteria: Snapshot fixture validates deterministic PosInfos fields via runtime stdout checks; semantic-diff fixture matches --interp for deterministic field relationships; docs/feature-support-matrix.md and README compile-only examples remove haxe.PosInfos; npm run test:ci passes.
notes: Starting PosInfos parity fixtures (snapshot + semantic diff) and docs tier promotion.
close_reason: Added stdlib/posinfos_basic snapshot fixture and posinfos_contract semantic fixture; promoted PosInfos support docs; full CI green.

title: Upcast return values to declared function type
close_reason: Return lowering now upcasts subclass values to declared return type; added inheritance_return_upcast regression snapshot

title: Phase 5: Hardening + Agent Docs
description: Stability, pass-registry validation, CI chunking, and policy docs.

title: Milestone 11: CI stability + docs
description: Registry validation, chunking, and durable docs.

title: Add AGENTS policy docs
description: Root and std agent instruction docs for contributors/agents.

title: Implement pass registry modularization + validation
description: Unique names, dependency resolution, cycle checks.

title: Implement harness chunking and rerun ergonomics
description: Stable --chunk, --failed, --changed flows.

title: Stabilize CI scripts and npm command surface
description: Finalize test command ergonomics and stability guardrails.

title: Devirtualize leaf alias call sites in gopher/metal
description: Extend RewriteVirtualCallsPass local candidate tracking so aliases of leaf constructor locals (e.g. copy = leaf) also devirtualize copy.__hx_this.method -> copy.method in non-portable profiles. Add paired gopher/portable snapshots.

title: Publish explicit feature-support matrix + unsupported expression inventory
description: Document supported vs unsupported Haxe language/stdlib surface, map to snapshot IDs, and track unsupportedExpr sites with explicit acceptance criteria for closure.
close_reason: Published docs/feature-support-matrix.md with snapshot-backed support matrix, unsupported hard-fail inventory, acceptance criteria, and reproducible stdlib gap probe inventory.

title: Fix do-while lowering semantics
description: Respect TWhile normalWhile flag by emitting proper do-while behavior (first iteration always executes and continue still re-checks condition) and add snapshot coverage.

title: Polish showcase examples: interactive tui_todo and upgraded profile_storyboard
Honor go_module in generated hxrt import path
description: go.mod already respects -D go_module, but emitted imports still hardcode snapshot/hxrt. Thread module path through CompilationContext and add snapshot coverage for custom go_module.

title: Phase 3: OO + Advanced Semantics
description: Implement OO dispatch, enums, switch, and exceptions.

title: Milestone 5: Classes + fields/methods
description: Class lowering without inheritance and deterministic mangling.

title: Lower classes to structs (no inheritance)
description: Instance fields, methods, and constructors.

title: Implement static field/method lowering
description: Top-level static symbol strategy in generated Go.

title: Implement deterministic Go naming
description: Add namespace-safe mangling and keyword escaping.

title: Add class/static/mangling snapshots
description: Coverage for collisions and class behavior.

title: Milestone 6: Inheritance + virtual dispatch
description: Self-dispatch strategy for override-correct behavior.

title: Implement self-dispatch runtime pattern
description: Introduce __hx_this interfaces and struct wiring.

title: Rewrite virtual call sites and super calls
description: Route base-typed virtual calls through __hx_this and bypass for super.

title: Implement ctor chain wiring + minimal downcast
description: Ensure constructor chains initialize dispatch correctly.

title: Add inheritance dispatch snapshot suite
description: Override dispatch, super calls, and base-typed references.

title: Milestone 7: Enums + switch
description: Enum representation and switch lowering.

title: Implement enum runtime representation
description: Interface + constructor struct representation.

title: Lower switch expressions/statements
description: Primitive switch and enum switch/type-switch lowering.

title: Add Option/Result handling hooks
description: Keep option/result modeling stable through lowering.

title: Add enums/switch snapshot suite
description: Coverage for bindings and basic option/result cases.

title: Milestone 8: Exceptions
description: throw/try/catch mapping via panic/recover runtime helpers.

title: Add runtime exception helpers
description: panic/recover wrappers for Haxe exception behavior.

title: Lower try/catch semantics
description: Map throw/try/catch with typed catch filters where possible.

title: Implement haxe.Exception subset
description: Support enough exception APIs for core std usage.

title: Add exception snapshot suite
description: Coverage for throw, custom throw, and catch behavior.

title: Add required CI gate + expand stdlib sweep coverage
close_reason: Implemented CI quality workflow and expanded strict stdlib parity sweep coverage

title: Fix PosInfos.customParams nil access panic in generated Go
description: Accessing pos.customParams in generated Go currently type-asserts a missing map entry to []any and panics in semantic runtime (seen in posinfos_contract draft).
acceptance_criteria: Generated access for optional PosInfos.customParams handles missing key as null without panic; add regression fixture covering customParams null check path; test/run-semantic-diff.py case passes.
notes: Implementing safe optional anonymous-field access lowering to avoid nil type-assert panic on missing PosInfos.customParams.
close_reason: Anonymous-object typed field reads now safely handle missing keys without nil type-assert panic; added posinfos_custom_params regression fixtures; full CI green.

title: Handle upstream-missing stdlib probe modules with version-aware policy
description: Gap probe currently leaves haxe.crypto.Sha512 and haxe.io.StringOutput as compile-time 'Type not found' in the installed Haxe stdlib. Decide policy: keep as expected-missing inventory, gate by Haxe version, or remove from probe list with documented rationale; add deterministic harness behavior for this case.
close_reason: Added version-aware expected-missing inventory for gap probe modules, deterministic sweep outcomes, and docs updates.

title: Devirtualize inline leaf constructor call targets in gopher/metal
description: Extend RewriteVirtualCallsPass to rewrite New_<Leaf>(...).__hx_this.method(...) to direct method call in non-portable profiles when the target is a leaf constructor call expression. Add paired gopher/portable snapshots.

title: Add integrated CI harness with semantic-release automation
Expose snapshot lock timeout through run-ci wrapper
description: Add run-ci flag to pass --lock-timeout to run-snapshots so CI pipelines can tune harness lock wait behavior through the stable entrypoint.
close_reason: Added --snapshot-lock-timeout to run-ci.py and forwarded it to run-snapshots.py --lock-timeout; documented usage and validated via full CI run.

title: Phase 1: Scaffold + Harness Foundation
description: Foundation setup for toolchain, macros, and snapshot harness.

title: Milestone 0: Repo scaffold + harness foundation
description: Scaffold repo and deterministic harness before real codegen.

title: Create toolchain/config scaffold files
description: Add .haxerc, package.json, haxelib.json, and extraParams.hxml.

title: Implement CompilerBootstrap classpath injection
description: Add front-loaded classpath injection logic for vendor and std paths.

title: Implement CompilerInit gating and registration stub
description: Add go target detection and compiler registration / explicit scaffold error path.

title: Implement snapshot harness skeleton
description: Create deterministic test/run-snapshots.py with selectors and timeout plumbing.

title: Add first snapshot case and test docs
description: Add core/hello snapshot fixture, test README, and test ignore rules.

title: Milestone 1: Minimal Go emission builds
description: Emit minimal Go main and pass compile/build snapshot loop.

title: Add minimal GoAST and GoASTPrinter
description: Support package/imports/main function printing.

title: Add minimal GoCompiler and GoOutputIterator
description: Compile Main.main into minimal Go AST and output file.

title: Add minimal runtime/hxrt and copy path
description: Emit minimal runtime package and copy into output.

title: Extend harness with gofmt/go test/diff
description: Wire gofmt, go test ./..., and intended/out diffing.

title: Add hello_trace snapshot and intended output
description: Golden snapshot for first emitted Go program.

title: Finalize go.mod generation policy
description: Decide always-generate vs test-only and deterministic constraints.

title: Promote haxe.Http/sys.Http into curated strict stdlib sweep
description: Now that advanced sys.Http parity landed and both haxe.Http + sys.Http pass strict --go-test in full inventory, add them to test/upstream_std_modules.txt (curated strict CI list) and update docs/feature-support-matrix module inventory block accordingly.
close_reason: Curated strict stdlib sweep now includes haxe.Http and sys.Http with docs aligned

title: Fix unsigned shift assign-op semantics
description: Ensure OpAssignOp(OpUShr) uses unsigned 32-bit semantics (same as OpUShr) and add snapshot coverage for >>>=.

title: Fix examples-artifacts release upload path for tag runs
description: Tag-triggered examples-artifacts workflow failed for v0.1.0 because release job expected dist-upload/dist/examples/... while downloaded artifact layout did not include that prefix. Normalize artifact paths (or discover files dynamically) so tagged releases can publish assets reliably.

title: Unify Go build detection across bootstrap and compiler init
description: Extract robust build-target detection into shared utility and use it from CompilerBootstrap and CompilerInit to avoid drift. Include nested @hxml define scanning with relative include resolution.
close_reason: Added shared BuildDetection utility and unified CompilerBootstrap/CompilerInit target detection logic, including nested @hxml define scanning with relative include resolution.

title: Implement minimal Std.isOfType lowering
description: Lower Std.isOfType with type-literal targets for core primitives, classes, and enums; add regression snapshots.
close_reason: Added minimal Std.isOfType lowering for primitives/classes/enums with type-literal targets and core/std_is_of_type_basic regression snapshot

title: Implement Reflect.field/hasField/setField runtime semantics
description: Semantic diff expansion exposed missing lowering/runtime support for dynamic reflection field operations (Reflect.field, Reflect.hasField, Reflect.setField). Add portable-compatible behavior and dedicated semantic regression fixtures.
close_reason: Added Reflect.field/hasField/setField shims with semantic-diff coverage and snapshot updates.

title: Enable default Go binary build after Haxe compile with go_no_build opt-out
description: Mirror haxe.rust behavior: Go backend runs go build by default after generation, with -D go_no_build / -D go_codegen_only escape hatch. Update harness/wrapper scripts to pass go_no_build when they run go commands themselves, and document defines/workflow.
close_reason: Added backend default go build on output complete with go_no_build/go_codegen_only opt-out; updated dev/template wrappers and test harnesses to use codegen-only where they run go commands; documented new build-control defines/workflow

title: Add deterministic sys.Http proxy and customRequest socket parity harness
description: The advanced sys.Http shim now supports PROXY and customRequest method override, but we still lack deterministic coverage for proxy URL/auth mapping and customRequest's optional socket argument semantics. Add a hermetic local harness (or shim-level unit contract) that validates proxy host/port/auth translation, verifies method override precedence when sock is present, and documents any intentional divergence from upstream sys.Http behavior.
close_reason: Added deterministic proxy/socket contract snapshot coverage and documented current sys.Http tradeoffs

title: Add examples artifact/release GitHub workflow
description: Create CI workflow to build example binaries with scripts/examples/build-binaries.sh, upload artifacts on push/dispatch, and attach release assets on tags.

title: Support prefix inc/dec in expression contexts
description: Lower prefix OpIncrement/OpDecrement when used as expressions (for example call arguments) instead of fatal error, preserving return-new-value semantics and adding snapshot coverage.

title: Add sys.net.Host runtime parity fixtures and tier promotion
description: Create deterministic snapshot and semantic-diff coverage for sys.net.Host constructor + string/reverse/localhost behavior so it is no longer treated as compile-only in representative docs.
acceptance_criteria: New snapshot fixture under test/snapshot/sys validates deterministic sys.net.Host behavior and runtime stdout; new semantic-diff fixture validates parity against --interp; docs/feature-support-matrix.md and README tier examples reflect upgraded support evidence; npm run test:ci passes.
notes: Starting deterministic sys.net.Host parity fixtures (snapshot + semantic-diff) and docs tier promotion.
close_reason: Added deterministic sys.net.Host snapshot + semantic fixtures, improved Host resolve/reverse/localhost semantics, updated support tiers in docs/README, and validated with full CI.

title: Harden security:deps against transient govulncheck fetch failures
description: security:deps currently fails when go install golang.org/x/vuln/cmd/govulncheck@latest cannot reach proxy.golang.org (bad file descriptor). Add retry/backoff or graceful fallback guidance so CI/local runs are resilient.
close_reason: Added govulncheck install retry/backoff with configurable attempts/delay, CI hard-fail enforcement, optional local soft-fail mode, and SECURITY.md documentation

title: Add string compound-assign snapshot
description: Add coverage for String += semantics with null and mixed operand types to validate OpAssignOp StringConcat lowering.

title: Add go_native goroutine + error result mapping coverage
description: Implement function-type lowering needed for callable go-native helpers, add Go.spawn support, and add go_native/goroutine_smoke + go_native/error_result_mapping snapshots.

title: Add regression snapshot for root-relative nested hxml include detection
description: Ensure BuildDetection resolves nested include paths that Haxe treats relative to the root compile hxml context (not nested file parent dir).
close_reason: Added nested_hxml_root_relative_include_detection snapshot to guard root-relative nested include resolution in BuildDetection.

title: Devirtualize leaf self-dispatch in gopher/metal pass
description: Implement RewriteVirtualCallsPass to rewrite self.__hx_this.method to self.method only for leaf receiver types in non-portable profiles; add paired portable/gopher snapshots.

title: Use typed string helpers in gopher/metal lowering
description: Emit typed string helper calls for String+String concat/equality in gopher and metal profiles to reduce interface boxing while preserving existing null-token semantics. Add snapshot coverage.

title: Add behavioral stdlib coverage for crypto/xml/zip modules
description: Current haxe.go behavioral parity fixtures now cover StringTools, Math, Date, Path, and Option. Add follow-on runtime shims/fixtures for haxe.crypto.*, haxe.xml.{Parser,Printer}, and haxe.zip.{Compress,Uncompress} to move those modules from symbol-level to behavior-level parity as well.
close_reason: Implemented crypto/xml/zip runtime shims, added behavior-level snapshot + semantic diff coverage, and validated in full CI.

title: Support --define=<name>=... in nested hxml build detection
Phase 2: Core Language Semantics
description: Implement portable core expression/function semantics.

title: Milestone 2: Expressions + primitives
description: Portable primitive/expression lowering with string semantics.

title: Implement primitive type mapping
description: Define portable mappings and string policy plumbing.

title: Implement expression lowering for core control flow
description: Arithmetic, bool ops, locals, assignment, if/else, return.

title: Add runtime string semantic helpers
description: StringFromLiteral, concat, eq, and Std.string-compatible helpers.

title: Add primitive/expression snapshot suite
description: Add arithmetic, if_else, null concat, and locals snapshots.

title: Milestone 3: Arrays + loops
description: Array semantics and loop lowering coverage.

title: Choose and implement array representation
description: Implement hxrt.Array or equivalent portable strategy.

title: Lower array operations
description: Array literals, indexing, length, push/pop semantics.

title: Lower loop constructs
description: while, range loops, and array iteration behavior.

title: Add arrays/loops snapshot suite
description: Snapshot coverage for array and loop semantics.

title: Research runtime generics strategy
description: Decide when/how to adopt Go generics in runtime after foundation stabilizes.

title: Milestone 4: Functions + closures
description: Closures, function values, default args, varargs.

title: Lower static and local functions
description: Support function declarations and values.

title: Implement closure capture semantics
description: Ensure captured locals produce correct runtime behavior.

title: Implement default args and varargs mapping
description: Lower optional/default parameters and variadics.

title: Add functions/closures snapshot suite
description: Coverage for closures, function values, varargs.

title: Cover remaining unsupported typed expression shapes
description: Continue reducing lowerExpr catch-all hard-fail paths by addressing additional reachable typed nodes (for example anonymous object literals) with explicit lowering or targeted diagnostics + regression tests.
close_reason: Added explicit lowering for anonymous object literals (TObjectDecl), anonymous structural field access/mutation via map-backed lowering, and regression coverage (core/object_literal_fields + semantic_diff/anonymous_object_literals), reducing lowerExpr catch-all surface.

title: Fix tui_todo command-mode persistence and README logo
Add haxe.Int64 runtime parity fixtures and tier promotion
description: Promote haxe.Int64 from compile-only representative status by adding deterministic snapshot and semantic-diff fixtures for core Int64 arithmetic/compare/parse behavior and updating support docs.
acceptance_criteria: New snapshot fixture validates deterministic Int64 output via generated Go runtime; new semantic-diff fixture matches --interp output; docs/feature-support-matrix.md and README compile-only examples are updated to remove haxe.Int64; npm run test:ci passes.
notes: Deferred: adding Int64 parity fixtures exposed fundamental Int64 lowering breakage (undefined synthetic symbols like haxe___Int64__Int64_Impl__divMod and missing temps). Needs dedicated compiler fix before tier promotion.
close_reason: Implemented Int64 lowering/runtime parity fixes, added stdlib/int64_parity snapshot + semantic_diff/int64_contract, promoted docs tiering, and verified with full npm run test:ci pass.

title: Phase 4: Stdlib Ladder + Go-Native
description: Implement high-signal stdlib support and Go-native APIs/profiles.

title: Milestone 9: Stdlib parity ladder
description: High-signal stdlib coverage with upstream sweep.

title: Implement upstream stdlib sweep framework
description: Add module list and sweep runner for early parity gaps.

title: Implement Json/Bytes/IO stdlib modules
description: High-signal stdlib modules for practical programs.

title: Implement ds maps/list + initial sys support
description: IntMap/StringMap/ObjectMap/List and incremental sys modules.

title: Add stdlib/sys snapshot suite
description: Coverage and integration with sweep checks.

title: Re-evaluate multi-package output design
description: Assess import graph and cycle strategy once stdlib ladder matures.

title: Milestone 10: Go-native profiles/surface
description: Profiles, strict boundaries, and std/go APIs.

title: Implement profile resolver and diagnostics
description: portable/idiomatic/gopher/metal conflict handling.

title: Implement boundary and strict mode enforcers
description: __go__ purity boundary and strict compile policy.

title: Implement std/go native API surface
description: Go, Chan, Result, Error, Slice, and Map modules.

title: Add go_native snapshot suite
description: Coverage for channels, goroutines, and error mapping.

title: Add semantic-diff fixtures for haxe.Http/sys.Http deterministic behavior
description: Add semantic differential fixtures that compare Haxe --interp and generated Go behavior for deterministic Http paths (data URLs, callback/status/error behavior, customRequest method override with optional socket arg placeholder). Keep fixtures hermetic (no external network) and wire into existing semantic-diff harness.
close_reason: Added deterministic semantic-diff fixture for haxe.Http/sys.Http direct+proxy+customRequest behavior
